::: {.column width="48%"}

Scenario modelling hub for Covid-19 cases, deaths and hospitalisations across Europe, created by a multitude of infectious disease modelling teams, coordinated by the [European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control](https://www.ecdc.europa.eu/en).

:::

::: {.column width="48%"}

![European Scenario hub logo](images/logo.svg)

:::

We are currently inviting participants to model [round 1 scenarios](scenarios.html#round-1).
